attributes.action: Work for 16-25 year olds living in wirral form the local regeneration projects
attributes.additional_details: Secure jobs and apprenticeships for 16-25 year olds living in wirral form the local regeneration projects
attributes.background: Local hoping to help local youth gain a future

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

Local regeneration projects are likely to be the responsibility of your local council, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
